MBD Escrow

Welcome to MBD Escrow

Trade with confidence, knowing that your funds are protected until the terms of the transaction is met.

2% service fee

Coming soon: disputes, milestones, validators, other tokens

For Creators

• Log in using your wallet on Polygon Network

• Fill in the necessary details and create

the contract

• Once created, go to the "Created" page to

view the status and progress of your contract

For Collaborators

• Log in using your wallet on Polygon Network

• Access the "Assigned" page

• View contracts sent to you by the creator.

• Review the contracts and proceed
